title: Letterboxes: the inside story
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Catherine South
brief_description: An engaging and humorous look at the significance of the letterbox in urban life. The letterboxes we see are of all different shapes and sizes. Their owners tell why they chose them and the impact the mail delivery has on their daily lives.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Catherine South
